name: Call of Freedom
description:
You hate your homeland. Another flood is an opportunity for you to escape this hell on earth. Make you dream come true!

Controls:
Use mouse cursor to choose direction.
LMB - move
RMB - dash
Dashing is the only way to get out of liquid.

Made for Global Game Jam 2017 (theme: waves).

22.01.2017 - release
09.03.2018 - html5 port
